adverb.description: With a sharp or steeply tapering edge or point.
With a sudden, piercing physical sensation or effect; intensely.
In a way that is distinct in outline or detail; clearly.
examples: the waitress had a sharply defined jaw

adverb.description: With a sudden and marked change; dramatically.
With speed of perception, comprehension, or response.
examples: he had to react sharply to repel a shot at his near post
